results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: European road links - President Pompidou and King Baudouin inaugurate the Paris-Brussels thruway. The arts: Monet the caricaturist - Claude Monet’s caricatures at the Marmottan Museum in Paris. Ossip Zadkine - retrospect show of the works of the sculptor Zadkine.

The Casa Velasquez - annual exhibition of the 1971/72 candidates.
